name: twilio-flex-spoke-directory-plugin
description: Spoke Directory plugin for Twilio Flex

scripts.plugin:start: npm run env:validate plugin && twilio flex:plugins:start -l debug
scripts.plugin:build: npm run env:validate plugin && rm -rf build && twilio flex:plugins:build -l=debug
scripts.plugin:deploy: npm run plugin:build && UNBUNDLED_REACT=true twilio flex:plugins:deploy --changelog="$CHANGELOG" --version=$npm_package_version -l=debug
scripts.functions:start: npm run env:validate function && twilio serverless:start --functions-folder=dist --env=./functions/.env
scripts.functions:build: npm run env:validate function && rm -rf dist && webpack --config webpack.functions.config.js
